articles.title: Kevvie locks in Broncos big man, Souths snare Knights back: Transfer Centre - Fox Sports
articles.description: Broncos coach Kevin Walters has secured the services of young gun forward Thomas Flegler with a two-year contract extension.
articles.content:
The 21-year-old from Innisfail has extended his current deal with Brisbane to the end of the 2023 season, turning down interest from other NRL clubs.
